channel.title: CVE Feed for Ubiquiti Inc. -- UniFi OS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ubiquiti Inc. -- UniFi OS

item.title: CVE-2023-31997|2024-08-02T15:03:28.530Z -- ubiquiti%20inc. -- unifi%20os
item.description: UniFi OS 3.1 introduces a misconfiguration on consoles running UniFi Network that allows users on a local network to access MongoDB. Applicable Cloud Keys that are both (1) running UniFi OS 3.1 and (2) hosting the UniFi Network application. "Applicable Cloud Keys" include the following: Cloud Key Gen2 and Cloud Key Gen2 Plus.
